author.literal: Wen-Bin Yu and Wen-Bin Yu and David A Lightfoot and Hong Wang and Min-Lu Liu and Alisa E. Grabovskaya-Borodina and De-Zhu Li

title: Phylogenetic approaches resolve taxonomical confusion in Pedicularis (Orobanchaceae): Reinstatement of Pedicularis delavayi and discovering a new species Pedicularis milliana
